name: cannon
desc: Damage shields and armor with sweet, sweet plasma

name: gun
desc: Hoaky religions and anchient weapons are no match for a good 20mm cannon at your side

name: Applique
desc: Survival in space depends on keeping space on the outside and air on the inside. Sure, everyone drills for hull breach - reach for masks and gloves, don helmets, communicate by radio and hand sign. But at the end of the day, the ship that keeps its atmosphere usually wins the fight. Sometimes that means welding on additional pieces of armor over weak spots, even if the design does not call for them

name: Cannon (tr)
desc: Why turn your whole ship when you could mount the cannons on a turret? We thought so.

name: Beam
desc: Collimated plasma beam. It can melt through any armor if you can get close enough to use it.

name: Torpedo
desc: If the Lovelace is the instrument of <Goldfaction>’s will, the torpedo is the instrument of its wrath. Each is equipped with a fully conscious (if small) AI that ensures a successful fire mission.

name: Missile
desc: The design of these hasn’t changed much. Suppose the fins give it away; those are for use in-atmo. It would be more of a hassle to stop putting fins on missiles at this point.
